replies.body: They need a Jazz Band Bard

dont ask.

I am not sure a drug use meme is correct for a game and boards that are used by 13 year olds. You are technically promoting a felony.

You can argue about decriminalization is happening, but this is not really the place for it IMO.

It's ok Big Sister of the Memes and Games threads, I thought it was funny :D and I am still praising the Sun extra hard XD

^ that look you get when your mom just yelled at you XD
all us 13 and 14 year olds know about this stuff.

Yes, because in the game that contains:
The manifestation of death that cut themselves in half with an axe
A serial killer obsessed with making death beautiful
A woman that lures people in with her looks and charm then kills them and steals their essence
A demigod who's actions led to the destruction of his own empire
And several characters who are murderers, bandits, psychopaths, thieves or traitors. 

It's important to remember one very important thing: http://gph.is/Z0UASt

Honestly, I have a suggestion for you that will make your life a lot better. get the stick out of your ass, and let people have some fun. this is a memes and games place. besides, most kids honest to god know this shit before they turn 10.
We have teemo who literally represents Satan and doing drugs (shrooms) in a nutshell. I think a funny meme is okay.
